metadata.title: CVE-2023-31618 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the sqlc_union_dt_wrap component of openlinkvirtuoso-opensource v7.2.9 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service(DoS) via crafted SQL statements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
